Installs and works perfectly fine if you follow the install instructions perfectly. However I have found that playing this past like 12 AM local time, your garunteed to have a ping higher than 200, and lag like shit... for me atleast. I guess because there aren't enough people playing anywhere near you to connect to. Even then theres a decent chance that you'll lag mid day... Basically, don't expect everything to work perfectly, because even legitimate copies of MW2 have a shit ton of problems online. But this torrent does work.
